data.text: The @EU_Commission on July 3, 2020, under EU State aid rules, has approved the Latvian government's investment of €250 million into the equity of the @airBaltic to contribute to overcome the economic crisis caused by COVID-19 and resume growth. Read more: https://t.co/hV8sK8gjJ0 https://t.co/HUP2WWurKA

Saskaņā ar ES valsts atbalsta noteikumiem, @EU_Commission 3. jūlijā apstiprinājusi Latvijas valdības investīcijas 250 miljonu eiro apmērā @airBaltic kapitālā, lai palīdzētu pārvarēt Covid-19 izraisīto ekonomisko krīzi un atjaunot izaugsmi. https://t.co/kclb3tCWVK
@Rimgaud38096738 Hello! Yes, that is normal - our system only asks for such data when needed! Have a nice flight!

How does international traveling feel post-lockdown for passengers? And how do pilots work during these times? Get a unique insight in the current life of airBaltic by subscribing to a video premiere by https://t.co/I8YdzSWkCz here 👉https://t.co/nLEVVzRzTJ https://t.co/72K8CxM4da

@jhauensuo Hello! May we ask you to DM us privately more details about the flights you are trying to purchase, as well as what kind of error or screen you are seeing after the rejected payment? Thanks.

It's another Friday with #airBalticQuiz! If you are following us closely, you should be able to answer this week's question very easily! Do you know the new name of our revised and improved airBaltic ticket types? 🎫

@gozenuch Hello, Andrey. First of all - we kindly invite not to share such sensitive details as booking reference number publicly for your own safety. Regarding the question, as your booking has been made via the travel agency, you need to contact them in regards to this: https://t.co/tvnXx8SEMO

urls.title: Travelling with pets | airBaltic
urls.description: Find useful information on making the journey comfortable for your pet (and for your peace of mind).

data.text: @KristiinaK4 Hello, Kristiina. On airBaltic flights from the United Kingdom animals are allowed in Cargo hold only (as checked baggage) or manifested cargo. To get more details on this, as well as request the service, please check this link: https://t.co/4ftIZTuzLP

We are excited to expand our route map, offering new flights from all Baltic capitals! This week we launched long awaited Vilnius – London route, offering three weekly flights to our passengers. Looking forward greeting you on board! ✈️ https://t.co/lKaDod4riu

urls.title: Travel regulations | airBaltic
urls.description: Your guide to getting the right information about travel documentation and up-to-date travel requirements.

data.text:
@DovileSukyte @LRTenglish @BNSLithuania @LithuanianGovt @15minlt @errnews @udre_anna On top of that all our passengers are provided with free Basic care kit consisting of wipes and face mask which needs to be used during the flight for the safety. For more details on our health measures please check: https://t.co/FIA6357sAq
Thank you.

@DovileSukyte @LRTenglish @BNSLithuania @LithuanianGovt @15minlt @errnews @udre_anna Hello! If there are enough free seats and passenger count on the particular flight allows that, we are leaving a seat empty next to the passenger. These seats are then taken if there are more passengers who would like to fly with us.
@IMinambres Hello! Thanks for your message. Please check your private messages - we have already replied there. Have a great evening!
@FCasey2808 Hello, Fergal. May we ask you to send us privately in DM message your booking reference number? Thank you.

As of July 1, @airBaltic introduces revised ticket types with extra flexibility for its flights: GREEN, GREEN plus, GREEN classic, and BUSINESS. Take a good look at the services each ticket type includes and find the best fit for your travel habits: https://t.co/8746ra70vS https://t.co/QJ6i1mgpKE
@RzaRza Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Stikla pudeles ir atļauts pārvadāt reģistrētajā bagāžā, taču aicinām tās rūpīgi iesaiņot.
@YfkaTweet Hello! We will be glad to see you on board! Have a nice day! :)

@lisandrakask Flights are planned however as you might be aware, situation with the virus, as well as the restrictions imposed by the Government changes, therefore there still might be some further schedule adjustments. We thank for your understanding in this uncertain situation.

After receiving all of the necessary permissions, @airBaltic  plans to resume direct flights from Riga to London on July 1 and from Tallinn to London on July 4. In addition, new direct flights from Vilnius to London on July 1 will be launched. https://t.co/ySeticYPRS
@lisandrakask Hello! Currently not due to imposed restrictions and high virus activity.
@Iaurensbitchh Hello! Yes, we are currently planning to perform the flights on this route as of July 1st.

data.text: @mdmitri91 Hello! Due to the increased amount of incoming requests, processing them can take more time than usual. Refund can be expected within 90 days from time request has been processed (for tickets purchased on https://t.co/YZH2a4156m). Thank you for patience!
@B_C_John Hello! It all depends on the situation with the virus, however currently flights are planned. :)

urls.title: Fleet | About us | airBaltic
urls.description: How many planes do you think there are in the airBaltic fleet? Find your answer online. See how many Boeing and Bombardier aircraft we fly.

data.text:
Thanks for all your answers! Almost 3/4 of you got the right answer - the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft is 38.7 metres! Even more technical geeky details 🔧 about the plane you may find on this page: https://t.co/SHfSMYWRjl 
Have a sunny Sunday! ☀️ https://t.co/f2cxtjpBXz
@Pattie_Twinkle Hello once again. That is correct - flight has been cancelled due to the restrictions, apologies. Currently flights are planned as of July 1st.
It's very sunny Friday here in Riga which means #airBalticQuiz is back! ☀️ We will go into more technical aspects of aviation this time - can you guess the length of our Airbus A220-300 aircraft? 📏
@Pattie_Twinkle Flights on this week were cancelled (not performed) due to restrictions.
@Pattie_Twinkle Thanks, you too!

@Pattie_Twinkle As we advised in our previous message, once we know that the flights cannot be performed (for some particular date, or period), they are cancelled in the system and passengers informed. Usually it is being done earlier than on the same day. Thank you for understanding.

@Pattie_Twinkle Hello! Once we will know that the mentioned flight cannot be performed on some particular dates (due to restrictions because of the virus activity in the country), flights will be cancelled and at the same time affected passengers informed. Thanks for your understanding.

@UGruntmanis Lūdzam ņemt vērā, ka PDF sarakstā visas izmaiņas var neuzrādīties (piem. nelielas izmaiņas grafikā, arī atcelšanas, kas var notikt arī tikai atsevišķiem reisiem), tāpēc lidojumus aicinām skatīt mūsu lidojumu meklētājā, vai konkrētās rezervācijas gadījumā sadaļā “Mana Rezervācija” https://t.co/7uAvNQ1ihs

urls.title: Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text: @UGruntmanis Varam informēt, ka reiss ierobežojumu dēļ (saistībā ar vīrusa situāciju Lielbritānijā) tika atcelts jau iepriekš - kāpēc ceļojumu aģentūra, kurā tika iegādāta biļete par to Jūs neinformēja, šobrīd pateikt nevarēsim. Ja vēlaties iesniegt sūdzību: https://t.co/Y5ZBQN2LCT

data.text: @_ilves Hello! Please DM us more details privately about the reservation purchased - passenger names/surnames, route, dates/times of the flights, e-mail address used as well as the sum reserved from your bank account, we will check.

@UGruntmanis Labdien! Atvainojamies par šo pārpratumu - nodosim šo gadījumu mūsu tehniskajai komandai un izmeklēsim, kāpēc tika nosūtīts šāds e-pasts. Jūsu drošības nolūkos aicinām arī izdzēst šo tvītu, kas satur sensitīvu informāciju (Jūsu rezervācijas numurs). Paldies!
@JamilBBoy557 Hey! Thanks for the kind words! Hopefully see you on board again in the future! ☺️

@Jaspincairn1 Good morning! Flights are planned however as you might be aware, situation with the virus, as well as the restrictions imposed by the Government changes, therefore there still might be some further schedule adjustments. We thank for your understanding in this uncertain situation.

data.text: Feeling full of life when nature is at its peak!☀️ Latvians believe that flower crown collects unique power from wild herbs and blossoms giving energy to its wearer. May your flower crown be abundant and Midsummer’s Eve full of light! https://t.co/3nCJP6WkTe

Izjust saulgriežu enerģiju, kad daba ir tās plaukumā!☀️ Paražas vēsta, ka vainagā iepītās zāles un ziedi dod īpašu spēku tā nēsātājam visu atlikušo gadu. Novēlām košus un gaismas pilnus svētkus! https://t.co/tAbZH9Qv2Z
When the longest day meets the shortest night – that’s when Midsummer magic happens! @airBaltic wishes you magnetic solstice time! https://t.co/c7uxJ82fzU

data.text:
@EMelnika Hello! To check the most latest status on the refund, we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:

data.text: We are happy to be one of the first airlines to join @EASA charter for the return to normal operations under COVID-19, pledging to work with their national authorities to put measures in place to support health safety. Read more: https://t.co/bgsNdSh58L https://t.co/02sKk5DyvG

Another Friday with #airBalticQuiz has landed! ☀️
This time we are wondering if you know how many passengers we've carried during the first four weeks since restart of our operations? ✈️
@Lupatniece2 Kā jau atbildējām, sīkāku jautājumu sakarā aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu. Paldies!
@Lupatniece2 Labdien! Lūdzam skatīt mūsu DM ziņas, kurās sniedzām atbildi. Sīkāku jautājumu sakarā aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu. Paldies!

data.text: @kitk2tty For the latest entry regulations is responsible the respective country, not the airline. For more details you may check: https://t.co/QIoNeWjHbT

We are happy to see passenger interest growing rapidly and we are ready to welcome all travellers on board! Last week the number of new reservations made for airBaltic flights to and from the Baltic capitals has grown 54%. Read more: https://t.co/r43q5aLHsE https://t.co/EpFU60fjzX

@kitk2tty Good morning! As you might be aware, situation with the virus in the UK, as well as the restrictions imposed by the Government does not let us to perform the flights, therefore there are further schedule adjustments. We thank for your understanding in this uncertain situation.
@OnBoardAgain Hello! Thank you for the kind feedback. We will be glad to welcome you on board again!

@SwimmerLv Hello! As you might be aware, situation with the virus in the UK, as well as the restrictions imposed by the Government changes all the time, therefore schedule adjustments are possible during this time. We thank for your understanding in this uncertain situation.

@mdmitri91 Hello! As you might be aware, situation with the virus in the world, as well as the restrictions imposed by the Government changes all the time, therefore schedule adjustments are possible during this time. We thank for your understanding in this uncertain situation.
@anuisforawesome Hello! Please check your DMs. Thank you!

Proud to operate the youngest fleet in the world! After introducing the “Destination 2025 CLEAN” business plan, @airBaltic has become the first carrier of @Airbus A220-300 single type fleet with the average age of aircraft being only 1.9 years. https://t.co/vt5G2GFfeG
